channel.title: How can I import one .java file into another?
channel.description:
How could I make a .java file that has some information in it. Like say "commands.java" (no, im not talking about a 508. LISTEN) how can I make a file so that I can use "client.java" for the importer. (I wish to make seperate files and they will be able to import into client.java)
If you don't understand what I men, I want to do something like this:
[u]Inside client.java[/u] Import commands.java
Okay? I want to make something like this happen to normal moparscape servers. ANYONE able to help me on THIS question? (cause I havn't had any help in some of my questions. I'm sorry)

How could I make a .java file that has some information in it. Like say “commands.java” (no, im not talking about a 508. LISTEN)
how can I make a file so that I can use “client.java” for the importer. (I wish to make seperate files and they will be able to import into client.java)
